worlds/menus/reeborg_intro_en.json.Hurdle 3:
def turn_right():
    turn_left()
    turn_left()
    turn_left()
def move_hurdle():
    turn_left()
    move()
    turn_right()
    move()
    turn_right()
    move()
    turn_left()
while not at_goal():
    if front_is_clear():
        move()
    if wall_in_front():
        move_hurdle()
